title: News24.com | International Covid-19 update | Trump lays out gradual reopening of US, Macron warns not to be 'naive' in believing China handled virus well
description: President Donald Trump has laid out guidelines for a gradual reopening of the United States after the battering of the coronavirus pandemic, saying normal life should resume quickly in some states.
content:
